Setup
```{r setup, include=FALSE}
require(tidyverse)
require(readxl)
```

#load data
```{r}
d<-read_excel("Metadata figure.xlsx")
```

#Plot
```{r}
ggplot(filter(d, !is.na(Stations)), aes(x=Region, y=Stations, fill=interaction(Source, Parameter)))+
  geom_bar(stat="identity")+
  facet_grid(~Season)
```
